solution_line_template: If the difference in scores between Farah and Hajar in the game is {score_difference} points, and Hajar's score is {hajar_score}, then Farah has a score of {score_difference}+{hajar_score} = <<{score_difference}+{hajar_score}={farah_score}>>{farah_score} points.
The overall score in the game is {farah_score}+{hajar_score} = <<{farah_score}+{hajar_score}={total_score}>>{total_score}
